‘eltitiee sanwidhanaya sathuwa thibi soyagena thibena widesha wyapara saha widesha banku ginum hi mudal rajapaksha santhaka nokara janatha santhaka karanawa nam ee mudalin aanduwe naya kotasak gewa janathawa matha panawa athi badu da adu kala haki wenawa.’
“badu“ saha “sudu“ yana thun aakarika kriyawaliya athulu anekuth “pajatha“ wada gana nisa ee gana wadi yamak nokiya innam...
mahindage aanduwa yatathe kanna bonna nathi, adhyapanayak nathi, motar bayisikalayak nathi bahuthara janathawak innawa kiyana ekenma aayimath kelawenne mahindatamayi.
man nam manapa na oyawa dana andunaganna...

ayadumkaru eya kumana aakaraye wyapara aayathanayakda yanna sandahan kala yuthuya: thani himikaru, hawulkarithwaya, simitha hawulkarithwaya, simitha wagakim hawulkarithwaya, sansthawa, simitha wagakim samagama ho wenath.
